definition: suburbs or outskirts/one of the five degrees of official mourning attire in dynastic China/official in charge of fields (old)

sentences.english: We soon caught up to the two princes of Midian, Oreb and Zeeb.
sentences.chinese: 我们很快抓住了米甸的两个王子，俄立以及西伊伯。

sentences.english: God has given the Midianites and the whole camp into his hands.
sentences.chinese: 神已将米甸和全军都交在他的手中。

sentences.english: The LORD has given the Midianite camp into your hands.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华已将米甸的军队交在你们手中了。

sentences.english: Lamadian oil field in Daqing is the largest gas cap oil field developed in China.
sentences.chinese: 大庆喇嘛甸油田是我国目前开发的最大一个气顶油田。

sentences.english: Barsac is maybe a little bit less liquorous and more fruity than Sauternes.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔萨克比索甸更带有一点烈酒味，也更富有水果味。

definition: Mt Tai in Shandong/same as 泰山
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
De'an county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
